summary: Year 1852  was a leap year starting on Thursday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Great Ormond Street Hospital  is a children's hospital located in the Bloomsbury area of London, and a part of Great Ormond Street Hospital for Children NHS Foundation Trust.
The Hospital is known internationally for receiving from J. M. Barrie the copyright to Peter Pan in 1929, which has provided significant funding for the institution.
title: Great Ormond Street Hospital
